alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Marion; Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 5:17PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Marion, northeastern Chattahoochee, southeastern Upson, central Talbot and western Taylor Counties through 545 PM EST... At 517 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Junction City to near Brantley, and moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Butler, Talbotton, Junction City, Geneva, Brantley, Juniper, Baldwinville, Rupert, Charing, Oakland, Olive Branch, Po Biddy Crossroads, Mauk, Howard, Tazewell, Marion Estates, Prattsburg, Big Lazer Creek Wma, Carsonville and Wesley Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
